text:
October 15, 1957
1r. William G. Carr
Executive Secretary
National Education Association
Washington, D. C.
Dear Mr, Carrs
Could you give us the address of Richard Krolik*s office in New York,
please? I*d like to put him on our mailing list to receive our TV Educational
Research Fact Sheets, among other items we issue.
Sincerely,
HJS/dfc
Harry *TÂ« Skornia
Executive Director
